titleStmt.title: Prædictio astrologica. The great and vvonderfull prognostication, for the yeare of our Lord 1598. Written by Rodulphus Grapheus Doctor of Phisick in the Towne of Deuenter. Translated out of Dutch into English by W. P.
titleStmt.author: Grapheuis, Rodulphus.
Philip, W., attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [John Windet for] Iohn Wolfe, with the assent of Rychard Watkins,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 12189 on UMI reel 1272.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
